title: Defence Secretary speech on threats to the UK

sections.heading: Summary
sections.content:
Daily digest of official releases touching Scottish and wider UK aviation activity:
- **Defence Secretary speech on threats to the UK** — The Defence Secretary set out the scale of threats we face, including from the Russian spy ship Yantar which was threatening UK waters between 5 and 11 November.
- **First ever government female veterans’ forum to put ex-military voices at the heart of support** — Female veterans are to be put at the heart of government support, through a new women veterans forum announced today.
- **easyJet launches new Inverness–Birmingham route for March 2026** — Inverness Airport is thrilled to share that easyJet has announced a new direct service between Inverness and Birmingham, bringing back a route that passengers have requested in recent years.
